mapper.select: select u.achievement_date, p.achievement_id, p.achievement_name, p.achievement_text, p.achievement_picture from prolingo_achievement p, user_achieve u where p.achievement_id = u.achievement_id and u.user_id = #{userid} order by p.achievement_id

select distinct p.achievement_id, p.achievement_name, p.achievement_text, p.achievement_picture from prolingo_achievement p, user_achieve u where p.achievement_id != u.achievement_id and u.user_id = #{userid} order by p.achievement_id
